LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays a Record Collection in a table format.

property.name: shownFields
property.label: Shown Fields
property.description: Comma separated list of Field API names to show. Parent relationship is supported (e.g. Account.Type).

property.name: editableFields
property.label: Editable Fields
property.description: Comma separated list of Field API names for inline editing. Does not support parent relationship (Account.Type). Saving does not write to server.

property.name: columnLabels
property.label: Column Labels
property.description: Comma-separated key/value pair consisting of fieldApiName=>newLabel. For example, to replace the default Username: Username=>My Custom Username Label

property.name: sortableFields
property.label: Sortable Fields
property.description: Comma separated list of Field API names. Parent relationship is supported (e.g. Account.Type).

property.name: sortedBy
property.label: Default Sort Field
property.description: Single Field API Name. Parent relationship is supported (e.g. Account.Type).

property.name: customHeight
property.label: Table Height (px)
property.description: Sets a table height in pixels. Leave blank for default.

property.name: useLoadStyleHackForOverflow
property.label: .Allow Overflow (EXPERIMENTAL)
property.description: WARNING: Removes scrolling within datatable, only use for small number of rows. Enable this for a small number of rows that require in-line edit. This overrides any custom table heights and allow for picklist and lookup edit menus to display on top of th edatatable. However, you may experience some weird CSS issues.
